text:
Julie Ann Strain (February 18, 1962 – January 10, 2021) was an American actress and model. She was "Penthouse" Pet of the Month in June 1991. In movies, she appeared in ' and "Beverly Hills Cop III". From 1998 through 2001, she hosted "Sex Court". She was born in Concord, California.
In November 2018, Strain announced that she had advanced dementia and was placed in hospice care. She died from the disease on January 10, 2021 at the age of 58.
